scripts.build: npm run db:generate && npm run build --workspace=@apex-sports/shared && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.deploy: npm run db:generate && npx serverless deploy
scripts.deploy:api: npm run db:generate && npx serverless deploy function -f api
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: cd apps/api && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/api && npx prisma db seed
